titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and Aldermen of the City of London at St. Mary-Le-Bow, Jan. 30th, 1693/4 by William Stephens ...
titleStmt.author: Stephens, William, d. 1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Lawrence ... and Brad. Aylmer ...,
